document.full_text: canadian e-reading service provider kobo inc said on tuesday it closed a c$50 million ($53 million) investment round aimed at speeding up expansion and new product development.
document.title: ebook seller kobo closes c$50 million investment round
lines_and_colors: canadian e-reading service provider kobo inc said on tuesday it closed a c$50 million ($53 million) investment round aimed at speeding up expansion and new product development.
